title: Don't Play The Game
itunes:title: Don't Play The Game
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Like I said, don't play the game...

***

Credited to JaneKillr and narrated by Heather Thomas

***

Note: minor edits were made to the original version including removing "part 1" from the title as no part 2 exists

***

Pre-order copies of "The Hate Home" at https://www.inkshares.com/books/the-hate-home

***

Please consider supporting the podcast at Patreon.com/Creepypod or creepypod.com/support

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQ3SrH_3fsROXFAjomKcUtw

***

Produced by Steve Blizin, Puzzle Audio

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko

 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
